Four friends roam the streets of Havana in search of happiness and true love.
Songs, guitars, sunsets, miracles, love letters. A hurricane gives a magical touch to this almost perfect anti-romance.

value.text: WITH A NEEDLE AND THREAD "focuses on creating family heirlooms that are textile based....printed...in both English and Spanish" Translated by @lawrenceschimel.bsky.social praises @fuse8.bsky.social afuse8production.slj.com/2025/06/27/m...

images.alt: With a Needle and Thread book cover

Interior page spread shows girl looking up at window at which a woman hangs out a cloth. Text reads: "One morning Romi spots Filipa, caretaker not only of the synagoge but the hearts, souls and stomachs of her neighbors.... Felipa hangs the community's festive tablecloth on the line to dry. Romi knows what this means--it's time for a celebration, a simja!"
